0:
[kubernetes]
  driver = "usbhid-ups"
  port = "auto"
  desc = "Tripp Lite 1500VA SmartUPS"
  vendorid = "09AE"
  productid = "2012"

MONITOR kubernetes@localhost:3493 1 upsmon secret primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

[upsmon]
  password  = secret
  upsmon primary
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL

#!/bin/sh

npm install homebridge-myq
npm install homebridge-nest
npm install homebridge-platform-orbit
until nc -vz postgres16-rw.databases.svc.cluster.local 5432; do echo "Waiting for postgres..."; sleep 3; done;
